events.text:
Welcome to my humble abode!
Why the look of shock?! I never said I was an interior decorator!
If you're feeling a little claustrophobic, join the club!

Back from The Abyss? What a delightful spot!
I hope you sent the [color=#00ba2a]Delicious Serpent[/color] my best regards.
They make a KILLER adrakaroni casserole! I wouldn't try a sample if I were you though.

Oh! You just visited [color=#08ff00]Coldheart Castle Keep[/color] for the first time?
That place is the kegger capital of the [color=#ff0000]Vale of the Dead[/color].
You might want to check out the old haunts: we partied in a sewer and a church basement.

The [color=#08ff00]Psycho Sewer Saloon[/color] is still open?! No way!
Before I became a boring and grizzled  [color=#38f5bc]Reaper[/color], I used to party there a lot.
[color=#08ff00]Princess Coldheart[/color] threw the most wicked parties before her eternal hangover set in.

Well, according to you we're looking for a child who was catapulted into the [color=#ff0000]underworld[/color] by a [color=#38f5bc]mad cow demon[/color].
Y'know... nothing out of the ordinary. 
How about I hang out here and you have a look around my [color=#ff0000]Urn[/color] and see if you can find one of my warp points?
I gave up when you had to help me out of the [color=#ff0000]Urn[/color]... 
but there has to be a working warp point around my room somewhere.
You seem WAY more excited about looking around than this scrambled brain of mine.

No luck yet? Hm...
The Reaper who owned this [color=#ff0000]Urn[/color]  before me said there was an "emergency exit".
I never was able to find it, hence my imprisonment, but maybe you're more clever than me.

events.question: I can tell you about what the Reaper left behind when they moved?

events.text:
Let's see...
The Reaper left behind that TV above the vending machine,
that ugly painting across from my bed,
and that essential tome that I prefer to use as a step stool: Reaper 101.
See if any of those things remind you of an "emergency exit" - I'm stumped!

No worries! I guess inventories aren't your thing...
I'll be here if you need me.
